rows.label: qst201708_msg0001
rows.name:
We were told to confirm the details
of the training here, sir...

rows.label: qst201708_msg0002
rows.name:
Ah, Newt-dono, we've
been waiting for you!

rows.label: qst201708_msg0003
rows.name:
With you participating in the training,
our comrades are all fired up!

rows.label: qst201708_msg0004
rows.name:
This seems like a rather
large-scale training exercise.

rows.label: qst201708_msg0005
rows.name:
Yes, this exercise simulates an enemy
invasion of Hadashal Palace...

rows.label: qst201708_msg0006
rows.name:
More than half of the capital's
standing army will be participating,
making it a large-scale exercise.

rows.label: qst201708_msg0007
rows.name:
Wow, that's intense. An
exercise like this is rare.

rows.label: qst201708_msg0008
rows.name:
You will all be participating
as enemy soldiers targeting
His Majesty the Emperor.

rows.label: qst201708_msg0009
rows.name:
What specifically will
we be doing, sir?

rows.label: qst201708_msg0010
rows.name:
Read the movements of the capital's
standing army, break through the
palace's defense network...

rows.label: qst201708_msg0011
rows.name:
...and find and attack
the evacuating Emperor.

rows.label: qst201708_msg0012
rows.name: Attack His Majesty the Emperor, sir?!

rows.label: qst201708_msg0013
rows.name:
I see. So our role is
to be the villains.

rows.label: qst201708_msg0014
rows.name:
This is a valuable experience.
By participating as the enemy,
we may make new discoveries.

rows.label: qst201708_msg0015
rows.name:
Most importantly, the objective is
to attack the Emperor... which means
we get to meet His Majesty!

rows.label: qst201708_msg0016
rows.name: Ooh, I'm getting fired up, sirs!

rows.label: qst201708_msg0017
rows.name:
We will also do our utmost
to stop your attack.

rows.label: qst201708_msg0018
rows.name:
You won't be able to reach
His Majesty that easily.

rows.label: qst201708_msg0019
rows.name:
I would have it no other way, sir!
Let us both give it our all, sir!

rows.label: qst201708_msg0020
rows.name:
Now then, it is almost time
for the operation to begin...

rows.label: qst201708_msg0021
rows.name: Are you ready?

rows.label: qst201708_msg0022
rows.name: Of course, sir!

rows.label: qst201708_msg0023
rows.name: Please wait a little longer, sir.

rows.label: qst201708_msg0024
rows.name:
Understood! Then, the
training will now commence!

rows.label: qst201708_msg0025
rows.name:
Roger. The operation start
time is approaching. Please
prepare quickly.

rows.label: qst201708_msg0026
rows.name:
Well done, Newt-dono!
Are you ready to begin?

rows.label: qst201708_msg0027
rows.name: Are you prepared?
